law.catch_line: Tax Titles Held By Towns; Notice Of Assignments, Redemptions Or Foreclosures
law.text: Whenever a tax title held by a town shall be assigned, or the land subject to a tax title so held shall be redeemed or the right of redemption thereunder foreclosed, the treasurer shall forthwith send written notice of the assignment, redemption or foreclosure, as the case may be, to the collector and, upon their request, to the assessors.
